snippet.title: Best Bluetooth headsets
snippet.description: Not only do they enable hands-free chatting, they also free you from dealing with tangled wires as y

snippet.title: Even the MythBusters can't herd cats
snippet.description: Adam Savage and Jamie Hyneman prove that maybe it's not quite so easy to get cats to do what you want. Then again, maybe they just didn't have enough fish flakes on hand.

snippet.title: Katniss the kitty? Cats remake 'The Hunger Games'
snippet.description: "Meow the odds be ever in your favor!" The Pet Collective casts cats in the roles of Katniss Everdeen and the other beloved characters from "The Hunger Games."

snippet.title: Time Lord cats, drones: Tumblr's newly updated policies entertain
snippet.description: Amusingly updated Tumblr legal guidelines remind bloggers to play nice, and not to mislead readers by using "Doctor Who" cat hashtags or posing as "Sherlock" actor Benedict Cumberbatch on the site.

snippet.title: Scientist: Cats think you are just a big, stupid cat
snippet.description: Anthrozoologist John Bradshaw insists that cats really aren't terribly domesticated and think that humans are the same species as them, but oddly "non-hostile."

snippet.title: Honeywell Wi-Fi Smart Thermostat with Voice Control
snippet.description: The voice control options are extremely basic, and the price increase just doesn't match the value added. Save some cash and get the $249 model or a Nest.

snippet.title: 2014 Nissan Versa Note
snippet.description: The 2014 Nissan Versa Note offers good efficiency and space for people and cargo, but there are so many better values in this class.

snippet.title: UpWord Notes
snippet.description: With gestures, theme customization, and plenty of other useful features, UpWord Notes is better than most competing title and a great replacement for Apple's Notes app,

snippet.title: Sigma 50mm F1.4 DG HSM | A Lens
snippet.description: While it's not cheap, the Sigma 50mm f1.4 lens provides great value for the money.

snippet.title: Hisense Sero 7 LT
snippet.description: The Hisense Sero 7 LT isn't worth your money -- skip it and go for its more robust counterpart, the Pro, instead.
